reference.title: Counting duplicate words in a document

section.p: provides a facility for counting duplicate words for one or more documents. The result is shown in a window and can be saved in a file. Duplicate words are words in segments which are contained more than once in the documents and will become exact matches once the first occurence of such a segment has been translated.
To count the number of words in all the documents of a folder, see .
Using the "Include memory match information" option, information on memory matches can be included in the created reslts.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: At least one document must exist in the selected folder.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
At least one document from the Document List window
Count Words… from the Utilities menu
The Count Words window (see ) is displayed. windowsCount Words Count Words windowFigure shows Count Words window

section.title: Options and parameters

plentry.pd: This box contains the list of the documents you selected in the Document List window.
Select: Duplicate words To count the number of duplicate words in the selected documents. Include memory match information To show information on memory matches in the results.

In this block you define where you want the system to save the results: Screen The result of the word count is displayed on your screen. This option is selected automatically. File Select this option to also store the count results in a file. You can:
Accept the proposed file name.
Type a file name of your choice.
Click Select… to display the Select File window from where you can choose the file name without having to type it (for a detailed description, see ).
Select the format of the count result file. The supported formats are
ASCII (plain text)
HTML
XML

section.p: Click Count to begin counting words.

section.title: Results
section.p: Result without Include memory match information option selected. The results of the word count are shown, for example, in the Word Count Results - Duplicate Words window (see ).

fig.title: Word Count Results - Duplications Words window

image.alt: Figure shows Word Count Results - Duplicate Words window

section.p: The window contains the following columns:

dlentry.dd: The number of translated words in the documents.
The number of untranslated words in the documents.
The number of words in duplicate segments. The first occurence of these segments is counted in the To be translated column.
The number of words which have to be translated manually.
The number of tags in the documents.

section.p: If you selected the File output option, the results are stored in the same format in the specified file.
To return to the previous window, close the respective Word Count Result — Duplicate Words window.

section.title: Results
section.p: Result with Include memory match information option selected. The results of the word count are shown, for example, in the Word Count Results - Duplicate Words window (see ).

fig.title: Word Count Results with memory match information- Duplications Words window

image.alt: Figure shows Word Count Results with memory match information - Duplicate Words window

section.p: The window contains the following columns:

dlentry.dd: All words in segments, which had already one occurrence in one of the document(s). The first occurrence of the segment is listed in one of the fuzzy columns and any additional occurrence of the segment is listed in the duplicate words column.

The number of words in segments for which there is a fuzzy match in the memory with a fuzziness of 95% up to 99% or segments for which another segment would become a 95-99% fuzzy match proposal during the translation of the document(s).

The number of words in segments for which there is a fuzzy match in the memory with a fuzziness of 75% up to 94% or segments for which another segment would become a 75-94% fuzzy match proposal during the translation of the document(s).

The number of words in segments for which there is a fuzzy match in the memory with a fuzziness of 0% up to 74% or segments for which another segment would become a 0-74% fuzzy match proposal during the translation of the document(s).
The total number of words in segments which have no exact match in the Translation Memory. This column contains the total of the duplictae words column and th efuzzy columns.
The number of words in segments for which there is one or more exact match in the Translation Memory.

section.p: If you selected the File output option, the results are stored in the same format in the specified file.
To return to the previous window, close the respective Word Count Result — Duplicate Words window.
